metadata.name: Chinger Winger / بمبالون #1
metadata.description:
This NFT includes only a sample of the original music, own it and go to the NFT page on KLOOV to listen to the Full Track https://kloov.com/stou/full-track/chinger-winger-بمبالون.

The title “Chinger Winger” is an expression that comes from a Tunisian cult comedy sitcom “Choufli 7al”. This expression means that everything is fine or everything is going as planned. Stou introduces a No melo loop of 16 bars and about 9 different flows in this song.
He offers several punchlines, both funny and light, but always full with a deep meaning. The song is a mixture of humorous provocation but very thoughtful and theatrical.

Giveaway

- QR code to access to a concert during the year
- Limited High quality Merch
